entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with rain early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
